mean_cn: adj. 殖民地的，关于殖民的；  n. 殖民地居民
mean_en: connected with or belonging to a country that controls another country; typical of or connected with the US at the time when it was still a British colony
sentence: In colonial times, Europeans invaded many other countries.
sentence_trans: 殖民地时代，欧洲人入侵了许多国家。
word_etyma: colon殖民地 + ial具有……的 → 殖民地的，具有殖民地特点的
